Articles.Content:
Im used to categories since i use the Subassembly Manager a lot.

I don't think im gonna uninstall it until the stock subassembly manager learns how to organize subassemblies in categories.
Yeah, it's great to have built in but certainly needs a user-customisable folder structure, accessible from in-game if possible... Hopefully there'll be some movement on that in a future update.

It's been suggested a lot of time before .22 was even out.

one example: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49465-Folders-for-sub-assemblies?highlight=assembly+folder
